All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
The main class that is the entry point for executing the drone system.
CentralArea
CentralArea class that stores data defining the polygon containing the main area of The University of Edinburgh.
CompassDirection
CompassDirection represents list of all 16 possible compass points the drone can navigate to.
Deliveries
Deliveries helps record the deliveries and non-deliveries made by the drone.
Drone
Drone class is the body of the system and brings together all the functionalities.
FileWriting
FileWriting class helps store functions that serialises and writes data produced to proper strings in files.
FlightPath
FlightPath helps record the flight path of the drones move-by-move.
LngLat
LngLat allows the drone to view its position using coordinates.
MenuItem
Individual item for sale in a Restaurant.
NoFlyZone
NoFlyZone consists of populated areas in central Edinburgh that the drone must avoid flying over.
Order
Order contains the details of customer's orders, including the list of pizzas to be delivered.
OrderOutcome
OrderOutcome represents the status of the delivery after processing the order.
OrderValidator
OrderValidator helps check Order and validate their details.
Output
Output contains all the data necessary to produce the output files desired.
PathGenerator
PathGenerator helps search for the most optimal route to deliver orders.
PathNode
PathNode helps represent LngLat details like a graphical node.
Restaurant
Restaurant allows system to find location of the restaurant and its menus for users to view and order.
RestClient
This Class acts as a REST API to interact with the REST Server from the URL and String date provided.
